name: centuries especially,
description:
A website called Outhouse Media
The best time to visit - a single Steam game - nowadays is now, if you're playing the latest title in the action RPG series. The game, which has sold more than a million copies from its launch on November 30, is called Dead or Alive Xtreme 3. It's available on Steam to cross-buy with other old favourites like Dead or Alive 5: Last Round and Dead or Alive 6. At the moment, it is only available in Japan, but Outhouse wants to roll out the game in all of the regions. To get a taste, Outhouse producer Tomoki Nakano takes us inside the game's world from an old friend. Akihiro Kurodazaki Who are you? I'm a developer. I say developer because in Japan there's a lot of games that are developed by developers and then the fans are critical of them, but I usually do the developing. What does this platform have to do with this? Well, the Xtreme 3 prototype is currently being developed by a team that's called Outhouse Media. We wanted to provide a new experience to the fans and that's what we did. Source: WikiMedia Commons
